explains: n. 合作，协作；勾结，通敌；合作成果
wordGroup: in collaboration with 与…勾结；与…合作

sentences.en: It was a collaboration that produced extremely useful results.
sentences.cn: 这是一次带来极其有益的成果的合作。

sentences.en: The government worked in close collaboration with teachers on the new curriculum.
sentences.cn: 政府和教师就新的课程进行了紧密协作。

sentences.en: Much hangs on the success of the collaboration between the Group of Seven governments and Brazil.
sentences.cn: 很多事情都取决于七国政府集团与巴西之间合作的成功。
